sources.title: Lying Lips
sources.description: A nightclub singer refuses to "date" customers, so she's framed for the murder of her aunt, convicted of the killing and sent to prison

sources.title: Lying Lips (1939) OSCAR MICHEAUX
sources.description:
BLACK HISTORY MONTH
Writer/Director: Oscar Micheaux
Stars: Edna Mae Harris, Carman Newsome, Robert Earl Jones 

When a nightclub singer is framed for murder and sent to prison,  a police detective sets out to prove her innocence.

metadata.Plot: A nightclub singer refuses to "date" customers, so she's framed for the murder of her aunt, convicted of the killing and sent to prison. However, her friend, who is a police detective, doesn't believe she did it and sets out to prove her innocence.
metadata.Actors: Edna Mae Harris, Carman Newsome, Robert Earl Jones
